item.title: Find the Flag Earn Swag: intigriti Twitter challenge Writeup
item.description: Intro On the beginning of this month, intigriti held a challenge like CTF on Twitter. This article is my write-up of the challenge! CHALLENGE: FIND THE FLAGüö© & WINüèÜ! There's a secret flag hidden in this tweet. Can you find it? üïµÔ∏è Check the rules in the replies! üëá#HackWithIntigriti #BugBounty #CTF https://t.co/0PFZNd692W — intigriti (@intigriti) 2019Âπ¥1Êúà9Êó• Write-up 1. Research the image attached the tweet Embeddeding any files to Image file is a well-known method of steganography.

item.title: DEF CON Quals 2018 Writeup
item.description: Intro. Recently, I have tried Permanent CTFs, but haven’t participated CTF competitions. I participated DEF CON Quals 2018 alone. Writeup You Already Know(warmup) - 101pt Stop overthinking it, you already know the answer here. You already have the flag. Seriously, if you can read this, then you have the flag. I have seen a problem like this on a write-up and I expected this problem so easy because the problem is warmup.

item.title: About
item.description: Profile I’m Teppay a Postgraduate Student majoring Information Technology and Cyber Security Twitter: @teppay_sec Github: Teppay Email: teppay.sec[at]gmail.com Blog(JP): http://teppay.hatenablog.com/ Blog(EN): https://teppay.github.io/ Interests All of Cyber Security Malware Analysis Capture The Flag Honeypot Penetration Test Reverse Engineering Languages Python(favorite) Assembly(beginner, readonly) Go(beginner) HTML Javascript C Tools VSCode: I’m against war IDA free Wireshark OWASP ZAP Burp suite Ongoing Works Learning Malware Analysis using Practical Malware Analysis Learning Web security through Hacker101(Powered by HackerOne) and some PoCs and Writeups.

item.title: How to Customize Cowrie on T-Pot
item.description: Intro As you know, T-Pot is awesome low-interactive honeypot which contains many kind of honeypots and log analysis software, ELK. However, because it is implemented using Docker, the way to change the setting of each honeypots is not simple. I wanted to change cowrie’s option from “AuthRandom” to “UserDB”. So, in this post, I will show what I did to change the cowrie’s option for friends who are beginner of T-Pot like me.
